testcase.name: Flight Finder page
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Newtours Home page........................................passed When I click on the Flights link on the left side menu......................passed Then The Flight Finder Page should be displayed.............................passed And “One Way” Flight details type is selected by default....................passed And “January 1” should be displayed by default for On and returning.........passed And “Economy Class” should be selected as default for the Service class.....passed

testcase.name: Register by entering only User Information
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Newtours Home page........................................passed When I click on the Register link...........................................passed And I enter "Jose", password and confirm as "password120"...................passed And enter "ANGOLA"..........................................................passed And I click submit button...................................................passed Then confirmation page is displayed with my "Jose"..........................passed
